alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Jefferson (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 06 at 8:06PM CST until March 08 at 2:10PM CST by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Meramec River at Valley Park. Meramec River at Pacific. Meramec River near Eureka. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 48 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Meramec River at Pacific. * WHEN...Until early Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, State Highway AK begins flooding near the intersection with State Highway O near this height. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CST Monday the stage was 16.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:30 PM CST Monday was 17.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow morning and continue falling to 2.2 feet Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7:00 am) Location Stg Stage Wed Thu Fri Sat Sun Meramec River Pacific 15.0 16.9 8.7 4.1 3.2 2.7 2.4 &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
